title: FC FShM Torpedo Moscow
text: FC FSHM Moscow () is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> team from <a href="Moscow">Moscow</a>. It played professionally from 1979 to 1996. FShM stands for "Football School of Youth" (Futbolnaya Shkhola Molodyozhi) and during Soviet times many junior players from Moscow played on the team to gain their initial professional experience. Their best result was 10th place in Zone 1 of the <a href="Soviet%20Second%20League">Soviet Second League</a> in 1986. It plays in the <a href="Russian%20Amateur%20Football%20League">Russian Amateur Football League</a> which have a semi-pro status.
